title: 2018 NFL Schedule Released (Football 04/20)
description:
The NFL schedule is here! The league officially released the 2018 NFL schedule and Will Brinson, Ryan Wilson and Sean Wagner-McGough are here to break it down from multiple angles. The guys discuss the Thanksgiving games, the Thursday night games, the Monday night games, look at the Rams tough stretch, wonder about Patrick Mahomes start to his Chiefs tenure, set an over/under for the Bears wins next year, debate Pittsburgh's rough road, wonder if the Browns will win a game and much, much more.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Football, NFL, NFL Picks, NFL Betting, 2022 NFL, NFL Predictions, NFL Recap
itunes:subtitle: Ryan Wilson and Sean Wagner-McGough join Will Brinson to discuss the release of the 2018 NFL schedule, break down the prime time matchups and try to guess how many wins the Bears will get next season
